LanguageData.BloodAnimations_BloodMultiplier: Amount of blood/debris particles (Flying particles from direct damage)
LanguageData.BloodAnimations_BleedRate: Amount of bleeding particles (Animated bleeding based on pawn bleed rate)
LanguageData.BloodAnimations_FilthMultiplier: Filth left by particles (Percentage of particles that leave blood/debris filth that require colonists to clean up)
LanguageData.BloodAnimations_BulletCasingToggle: Enable bullet casings (Shell ejection animation from firing guns)
LanguageData.BloodAnimations_BulletCasingFilthToggle: Enable filth left by bullets (Chance for gunfire to leave bullet casing filth that require colonists to clean up)
LanguageData.BloodAnimations_GroundImpactToggle: Enable ground impact particles (Bullets hitting the ground will create flying dirt chunks)
